text_show:
Fiamthu hian chin tawk a nei. A hmun leh a hun hriat hi a pawimawh em em bawk. Influencers pathum te chuan Taxi Driver pakhat an lo prank ringawt vangin Jail bang an zut phah lel dawn tih hriat a ni.
Russia a cheng influencer 3 te hian March thla liam ta khan business taxi chu ruk tum ni awm takin Driver an prank a, Driver hi hmang tur anga insawi in seat a a thu chu hnung lama bungrua bag vel dah luh pui turin an ko chhuak. Cab driver in a hawn rual hian an zinga pakhat chu seat ah chuangin a tlanpui daih a, an zinga bloggers pakhat awm ve chuan thil thlen dan chu video in alo cover a ni.
Driver hian prank a ni tih engmah a hre silo a, a lirthei chu ruksak anga ngaiin pek kir leh a nih hma chuan Police te hnen ah alo hriattir diam hman.
Police te chuan influencer te hi thubuai an siam sak nghal a, an zingah Aidyn Tussupov pawh telin a ni phei hi chu Instagram ah pawh maktaduai 1 chuang zuitu (followers) a nei bawk. Tun hi prank an tih vawikhatna mai a ni tawh lo.
Taxi Driver an prank vangin kum 3 leh thla 6 tang tura tih an ni. Ningani khan Authorities ten thuchhuah siamin Dumshebay E., Tusupov A., Khasanov R. N. te chu paragraph 2 of Article 166 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation hmanga thubuai siam sak an nih thu an puang a, Moscow tang 500km a hla prison camp ah nawrliam an ni dawn ta a ni.

Nimin khan School Education Minister, Lalchhandama Ralte kaihhruaina in a Pisa-ah zirna kaihhnawih pawl hrang hrangte chu zirlaite hnena School Fee lakdan chungchang ngaihtuahin an thukhawm.
He hunah hian School Education Minister, Lalchhandama Ralte chuan Mizoram mai nilo khawvel in ala hmelhriat ngailoh COVID-19 hripui leng avangin kan ram zirna pawhin harsatna lian tak a tawk chho a, kumdanga School tan hun pangngaiah zirna In pawh hawng theilo in kan awm ta hial a ni, a ti a. He hripui leng hian kan ram leh chhungkaw tin economy a khawih avangin kumdang-a kan kaldan pangngai a kal remchan lohna tam tak a awm ta a. He kan harsatna tawh avang hian Mizoram chhunga zirna In zawng zawngte pawh inhriatthiamna thui tak nei a kal turin a ngen a. COVID-19 vanga harsatna tawh chhungin School hrang hrangte pawh fee sang zawk la lo tur leh zirna In a fee chi hrang hrang lak thinte pawh ti tlem turin a ngen bawk.
He Meeting hian Kohhran leh Private School zirna In hrang hrangte hnenah ngenna siamin Mizoram-ah COVID-19 avanga Lockdown neih chhunga zirna In te hawn a theihloh chhung hi chuan zirlaite hnen atangin Monthly Fee 50% aia sang lakloh tur a ni a. Hun harsa kan tawnlai a nih avangin mi harsa School Fee pe theilo te chu ngaihnatthiamna pe tur leh a tul chuan Fee awl thlenga an harsatna sutkian pui tura ngenin, kum 2020 April thla chhung atana School Fee a full a lo la tawhte pawhin May 2020 atan siamrem turin an ti a ni.

Bandh ziaka chiatheilo uh
CRPF ah head constable ding lakna PET chu tuni Imphal ah um ding ti himaleh General Strike um ziak in Lamka lam akipat kuan dinga kisa te chu a chiathei puau ti thu hiat ahi. MPLF te chun India President Prathiba Devisingh Patel in Manipur a hung phak ding dawilo na ziaka dakkal 40 sung General Strike abawl uh ahi. Manipur bandh um mun mama ziakin Imphal ah sepna kihawl na te achun tamvei tak Lamka lam mi te chu pang thei ngailo hi’n akigen hi.

Tyson Fury leh Deontay Wilder-ten a ṭum thumna atana world heavyweight title fight an neih hun tur atan October ni 6 tihchian a ni.
Hemite pahnih hi July ni 24-ah Las Vegas-ah inhnek tura tih an ni a, mahse British heavyweight boxer Fury hi an test-naah Covid-19 a vei tih hmuhchhuah a nih avangin an inhnek hun hi sawn a ni ta a ni.
Thla 14 kal ta, February 2020 khan kum 32 mi, Fury hian American boxer kum 35 mi, Wilder hi hnehin WBC champion a ni a, hemi hmaa Los Angeles-a an inhnekah an lo in-draw tawh a ni.
Hemite pahnih inhnek ṭum thumna tur hi covid-19 hri lengin a tihbuai avangin ṭum engemawzat ṭhulh a ni a, Fury hian heavyweight title pathum ngawt kawltu, a hnampui Anthony Joshua hmachhawn a tum renrawn a, mahse Wilder a hmachhawn hmasak leh phawt a ngai dawn a, a chhan chu an inhnek ṭum hnihnaa Fury-a’n Wilder hnenah World Champion title a laksak ṭum khan an inremnaah Wilder hian a duh chuan Fury hi hmachhawn leh turin an lo ziakfel tawh a ni.
Fury hian mi 31 hnek tawhin a la tlawm miah lo a, hetihlai hian Wilder hian mi 44 a hmachhawn tawhah Fury chiah hi hneh loh a la nei a ni.

Green India Mission hi National Action Plan on Climate Change hnuaia mission 8 zinga pakhat a ni a. Ramngaw hectare maktaduai 5 a zau siam tumna a ni a.He scheme hmanna senso tur hi hmarchhak bial tan central sorkarin 90 % a tum anga abak chu state sorkar tum tur a ni. 12th Plan chhung atana hman tur Cheng vaibelchhe 13,000/- dah a niin, kum 10 chhung lo awm tur atan Cheng vaibelchhe 46,000/- ruahman a ni bawk a ni.

Special Judge (Prevention of Corruption Act) Dr. HTC. Lalrinchhana chuan kar kalta Zirtawpni khan Sujata Chakma hi IPC Section 409/420 leh 120 B bakah Prevention of Corruption Act, 1988 section 13 (2) r/w 13 (1)(c) leh (d) leh IPC

a erawh a pasal nena Rs. 34,66,585 tihchingpen thubuaiah Special Judge chuan thiamloh chantirin kum li (4) chhung Jail tang tur leh cheng nuai 12 chawi tura hremin Pawisa hi a pe thei lo a nih chuan kum 6 dang Jail-ah a tan belh a ngai dawn a ni.Kum 2012 khan 13th Finance Commission chuan CADC Session Hall sakna a tan cheng nuai 300 ruahmanin cheng nuai 232 chu Mizoram sawrkar in CADC kutah a pe a. tor Pu R. Oscar entu an pung
95th Academy Awards (Oscar) chu nikum nena khaikhin chuan TV lam thlirtu 12%-in an pung a, chutih rualin COVID hmalam boruak nena khaikhin chuan viewer punna hi a la tihtham vak chuang lo. Kumin Oscar khan entu maktaduai 18.7 nei angin an chhut a ni.
Kum eng emawti chhung kha chu Oscar hi TV program entu ngah ber dawttu a ni thin a, Super Bowl chiah a pha lo, an ti thin. 2018 hmalam zawng kha chuan Oscar hian entu maktaduai 30 chuang te a nei thin a, entu a ngah ber tum chu 1998 kha niin, mi maktaduai 55-in an en angin an chhut a ni.
2014-ah khan entu maktaduai 43.7 a nei a, khata tang khan tlakhniam lam a pan ta a, 2018-ah entu maktaduai 26.5 neiin, 2019-ah 29.6 a kai leh a, 2020-ah chuan 23.6-ah a tla leh a, 2021 khan entu a neih tlem ber tum niin, COVID hripuiin min nuai lai a ni bawk a, entu maktaduai 9.85 chauh a nei a, 2022-ah maktaduai 16.6 a kai leh a, hei hi entu a neih tlem ber dawttu niin, kuminah maktaduai 18.7 a kai leh chung pawhin entu a neih tlem lamah pathumna a la ni tho a ni.
Kumin show hi 2017 leh 2018 host Jimmy Kimmel-a’n a host leh a, award semna show-ah hian Rihanna leh Lady Gaga te an perform chung pawhin beisei a la pha thei ta chuang lo. Hetihrual hian television viewership hi thildangah pawh a tlahniam ve reng reng a, hei hi streaming vang niin a lang a, social mediia Instagram, Twitter, Facebook leh YouTube lamah chuan viewer maktaduai 27 vel nei angin an chhut a, Twitter-ah pawh No.1 worldwide trending topic a ni thei bawk.

J&K-a Sopore-ah tukin khan tualchher bomb chak tak tihpuah a ni a, police pali an thi a, mi dang 2 an hliam. Jaish-e-Mohammed mi firfiakten bomb hi an tihpuahah an chhal a, thuneitute chuan bomb hi bazar hmun lun laia kam a nih thu leh police motor-in a chil puak niin an sawi a, hliam-te hi damdawi ina enkawl mek an nih thu leh, bomb puahna hmun hi kal pawh theih loha khar rih a nih thu an sawi. Sopore bialah hian inlak hran duhtu pawl hrang hrangten vawiina bandh huaihawt an tum avangin, ven himna pawh a khauh hle a, buaina chhuak mai thei reng a nih avangin, sipaite pawh inralring reng tura hriattir an ni.

Lungkua chung I a tlua mi Thialand ramum minung 13 kong ah hin zei bantuk in dah coza le a dangdang in rian tuan a si.?
Thailand ram ah a tlaimi minung 13 hna ah hin kum (11- 16), pakhat lawng te coach (nipiat lawng hi kum 25) asi, Bawlung chuih mi an si, coach he lungkua chung ah lut an I tim in kal mi an si fawn, an tlau nak cu zarkhat bak a si cang ko, zei hmanh ankonglam theih ansi rih lo.
An lut nak lungkua bawng ah cun an i citmi satbing cu hmuh a si, lungkua chung lut In tlawmpal hi cun lam khatlawng asi ko, kal deuh ah hin lamtampi um mi a si caah, a thuh deuh nak lut ruang ah atlau mi si lai tiah ruah mi asi. A thuh deuh nak ah cun ti in a khat caah, ti luh thiam hna zong nih an kawl leng mang lio a si ko. Ti zong sat in lak in an kawl cuah mah lio a si fawn, Ruah hi cat lo in a sur caah ti zong a noi, zei hmanh hmuh khawh a si rih lo.
A hlan zong ah mah lung khua chung ah hin mi an rak tlau bal tawn tiah chim a si, a caan thenh tein chuah khawh an rak si caah an nung nak liam mi cu an um lo, a caan thenh lo in chuah khawh lo si ah cun nun nak tiang liam khawh mi si. Mah lungkua hi Thailand ram ah a saubik mi cung ah a tel ve mi a si tiah news nih a chim. Tu tan a tlau mi zong a caan tenh in an hmuh khawh lo a si ah cun an nun nak cu chanh manh an si te lai lo, thin phang ngai a si ko.
Cf. AWDN

Sagaing, Sataung peng, Nyaung NgotTo khua lal le a kuthnuai pakhat cu ralkap pawlin an theihsual ruangah meithal in an kap. November 10, 2021 sun ah an khua lal le a kuthnuai mi pakhat cu Pyu Saw Htee pawl ih bomb kamnak ih an hmang ding mi zen an va phur.
An tlun lamah ralkap pawlin PDF ah an rak ruatsual ih an kap. Tualsung mi pakhat in “Nyaung NgotTo khua lal le a kuthnuai cu Pyu Saw Htee pawl ih bomb kamnak ding hrangah hmun dang ta zen an va la, Nyaung NgotTo khua an thleng hlanah ralkap pawlin an rak dingter nan “Khua lal ka si hi” tin an tlan ruangah meithal in an kap” a ti.
Ralkap lamtang khua lal kum 40 mi Ko Naing Htay le a kuthnuai tlangval kum 20 mi Aung Ko cu hliamhma nasa zet an tuar ruangah Mandalay siizung ah an tlanpi ih damlo bese tuamhlawmnak khan sungah an tuamhlawm rero lai.
Khua lal ih lu ah an kap ngah ih a kuthnuai ih pum ah an kap ngah. Nyaung NgotTo khua lal le a kuthnuai in PDF sakhan te umnak cu ralkap pawl hnenah an rak sim zo, October 17 simlam ah PDF sakhan te cu ralkap pawlin an va sim ih an kap ciamco ruangah PDF 2 an thi ih pakhat an kai.

Khawpui zanreh awm ve lohna an tih mai hi khawpui pawisa ngah tam berna a ni bawk e. New York City chu khawvela billionaire tam berna khawpui a ni a, he khua cheng billionaire te hausakna belhkhawm chu dollar trillion 3 chuang a ni. Trillion khat hi maktaduai hlir maktaduai (10,00,00,00,00,000) tihna a ni.
US finance hmunpui an tih mai, khawvela stock exchange lian pahnih awmna ni bawk New York City-ah hian billionaire 101 an awm niin Forbes chuan an tarlang a, millionaire phei chu 3,40,000 chuang an awm! He New York khawpui a chengte hausakna belhkhawm hi G20 ram tam zawk te hausakna ai pawhin a tam zawk!
New York khawpuia billionaire 101 an awm bakah a thenawm lawk Long Island leh Connecticut-ah te pawh mihausa tawntaw thahnem tak an awm ve leh bawk a, Greenwich, Great Neck, Sands Point leh Old Westbury te nena belhkhawm phei chuan billionaire hi 120 lai an nei pha a ni.
Khawpui billionaire tamnaah hian New York hi Hong Kong, Beijing, Shanghai, London, Moscow, Mumbai, Shenzen, Singapore, Delhi leh San Francisco ten an dawt a ni.

Mizoram Baptist Kohhran Assembly hnuaia Rorelna sangber, Assembly Executive Committee Meeting chu January 22-24, 2019 hian Mizoram Baptist Kohhran Biak In, Serkawn-ah neih a ni dawn a. Committee atana thil tul leh inbuatsaihna hrang hrang te pawh zawh fel a ni ta.
Kumin Assembly Executive Committee Meeting-ah hian BCM – General Secretary, Associate General Secretaries leh Executive Secretaries te thlan thar kum a ni a. Tin, Department Heads leh Institution Heads tur te pawh Nomination Committee-in a ruat thar leh dawn a, Nomination Committee hi naktuk January 22 ah hian Secretary te thlan zawh-ah an thu khawm veleh nghal dawn a ni. November 9 ni ah Sagaing ramthen, Taze peng, Kan htuu Manay Myay palek sakhan ah hmunhma la mi palek pakhat cu SAC ralkap phu chung I hremnak a celh ti lo caah G4 meithal pakhat, kuan 200 hna he a rak i surrender tiah Swebo peng dothlennak phu (14) in tuanvo ngeitu pakhat nih Yangon Khit Thit media ah a chim.
Dothlennak phu hna nih lunglawm tein an rak cohlan caah ai lawmhnak a langh ter. Mipi hna he hmunkhat te ah ka dir a tlai nain a tu bantuk in ka tuah nak cung ah kai chir lo tiah a rak I surrender mi palek nih a chim.
“Arak chuahnak sakhan chung ah cun zeitik dah kan thih la tilawng kan hngak. Chungkhar kong le pehtlai in CDM a tuah rih lo mi hna zong an tampi tiah chim. Kan nih dothlennak phu nih cun a chung khar him bawmnak kong ah a si khawh chung in kan I zuam lai. Laksawng pek ding zong in timhtuahnak kan nei” tiah a chim chap.
Hibantuk in I surrender a duhmi hna nih Shwe Bo dothlennak phu (14) ah pehtlaih khawhpeng kan si I, ai surrender mi SAC ralkap si hna seh, palek si hna seh a si khawhnak bik in kan in zohkhenh peng hna lai tiah a thanh chap.

Hakha COVID-19 Case-150 cu voi thum tiang a ngandamnak chek a si i, a voi thum ning tein a takpum chung ah COVID-19 rungrul hmuh a si ti lo (Negative) ca ah sii-inn in chuahter timh a si, tiah kan theih.
“Chun hnu cun, sii-inn in ka chuak cang lai. Ka ngandamnak voi thum tiang an ka chek i a voi thum ning tein negative ka si. Sii-inn in ka chuah hnu ah ni 14 chung ka ngandamnak zoh ka si rih lai. Acu belte, khoika Quarantine ah dah an ka chiah te lai, ti mi tu cu ka hngal ve rih lo,” tiah COVID-19 Case-150 nih DVC ah a chim.
Chin Ramkulh ah COVID-19 zawtnak a ngei mi minung 6 an si i cu chung ah Tedim sii-ah a um mi COVID-19 Case-1 le Hakha Sii-inn ah a um mi Case-150 cu sii-inn chuahter an si cang.
Myanmar ram, May 13, zinglei 7:00 tiang ah COVID-19 zawtnak a ngei mi minung 180 an si. A dam mi minung 76 an si i sii-inn in chuahter mi minung 64 an si. Cun, a thi mi minung 6 an si, tiah kan theih.
Source: Democratic Voice of Chin-DVC

Mizoram chu ziak leh chhiar thiam tamna ram a nih angin vote thlak ngaihpawimawh kawngah state dang aiin beisei a sang tih chief electoral officer Mizoram Madhup Vyas chuan a sawi.
Kumina MLA inthlanpui neih tur inpuahchahna endikin CEO hian Nilaini khan Lawngtlai district a tlawh a. Inthlanna kalpui tura mawhphurhna neitute kawmin political party aiawh leh tlawmngai pawl hruaitute a kawm. EVM dahthatna hmun Strong Room leh polling station thenkhat a endik bawk.
CEO chuan voter za zela 83 aia tlem loin vote an thlak theih nan inthlan kalpui nana mawhphurna neite chuan an hna a hun taka an hlenchhuah theih nan theihtawp chhuah turin a chah a. Vote thlak ngaipawimawh tura inzirtirna, Systemic Voter Education & Electoral Participation (SVEEP) chu mipui tam zawk huap tura hma lak a pawimawh tih sawiin, returning officer leh assistant returning officer-ten an mawhphurhna an hriatchian theih nan ECI inkaihhruaina bu chhiar tam turin a chah.
Polling station tinah inthlan hma ni thum chhungin duty leh vote thlak turte mamawh zualpui, eng chhit, tui intur, inthiarna leh kailawn ruahman fel vek tur a ni, tiin, thawh hona tha tak hnuaiah inthlan hlawhtling tak kalpui a nih theih nan duhsakna a hlan a ni.
Lawngtlai district election officer H Lalhmingthanga chuan an district dinhmun, electoral roll ennawnna kalpui dan, polling station ruahman dan leh inthlan kalpuina tura inpuahchahna tlangpui chu CEO hi a lo hrilhfiah a ni.

Ni 15 chhung zet CBI te kuta lo awm tawh, P Chidambaram-a’n INX Media thubuaia anticipatory bail a dilna ngaihtuahtu Supreme Court chuan sum leh pai kaihhnawih thubuai, Economic offence ang chiah te chuan anticipatory bail pek zung zung a remchang lo tih a sawi a, P Chidambaram-a thubuai chu anticipatory bail pekna tur chi a ni lo tih a sawi.
Court chuan sum tih chingpenna a awm nia sawi chhuichiangtute chu zalen taka an hna an thawh theihna tura remchang siamsak tur an ni a ti a, tuna anticipatory bail pek chu thil chhuilai ti khaihlak thei a ni a ti.
Enforcement Directorate hian P Chidambaram-a hi an man nghal a, Tughlaq Road police station ah hruai a ni ang a, Enforcement Directorate hian thu zawhfiah tura an kawl a nih loh chuan Tihar Jail-ah dahluh a ni ang.
Hetihlai hian thubuai dang, Aircel-Maxis chungchangah erawh P Chidambaram-a hi anticipatory bail pek a ni thung a, he thubuai hi kum 2006-a ramdang a\anga sum hmuh dollar maktaduai 800 hu thubuai a ni a, he thilah hian hlawkna telah P Chidambarama hi puh a ni bawk.

Job in a suallo i, mawh hnak zaikhai nailo ing, tiin, thiamthu rel dekdo ve i. Hnuataber ah Pathian in Job heh, “na fel ngaingai maw? Na fim ngaingai maw? tiin, Pathian in Job heh hau i (38 – 42). Job heh Pathian hmai ah a lung fim leh ai, Pathian in hmuifu a let in pe leh i. Pathian in Job ai rualpi pathumte khai heh, “zaimanin i cengfa Job in it hu heh a d
... (229 chars skipped) ...
rualpite fimtar ngai in (Fim roh bangin ruat dun in), Job harsa hnak heh tuarpi i. Ikhalselai, Job hrangah thazang ngah hnak ah canglo in, suahnia heh siatcam in, nunhnak vumah phuncam hnak, suak ruai sawn i.

Fimhnak le linghnak in minungte hngal ruai ai iithnak in kin hiang ai umtute tungding i (1 Korin 8:1). Ciamanin, thu kin linghnak le kin fimhnak te heh kin hiangai umtute ca ah siatral hnak le sawnhnak ah ilo in, tungding hnak le phathnem hnak suak tu sawn seh.

Nov. 19, 2016: Gam mipi tampi in zahtakna tawh mi hangsan (hero) bangin a kivui ding a deih loh hangun zan in Philippines khuapi Manila sunga president luite, galkapte leh la leh lim suaihsiamte kivuina hanmual Cemetery of Heroes kici ah lungphona a pian’ ding panin kipelh theihna dingin President lui Ferdinand Marcos a sim (secrecy) in zan sun thau long 21 kilawm in kivui hi.
Marcos mi hangsan banga vui ding deih lo a lungphona nei ten, “Marcos pen a sih dongin guta (thief) hi a, thuneihna a le
... (544 chars skipped) ... 
a a thuak (victims) ten a kivui theih lohna lungphona neih ding na sawm den uh hi.
Opposition senator Paolo Benigno Aquino IV in Marcos a kivui teitei pen buaina/siatna pian’sakna ding gamtatna (sinister move) hi a, Filipinos mi tampi in Marcos in human rights a palsatna leh Martial Law (galkapte thuneihna tawh ki-ukna) a koihna hangin sihna tuak tampi thuakte ngetna kumpi in a bil hum san hi ci hi.
Marcos in December 30, 1965 – February 25, 1986 dong President na len a, kilaih gawpna deih mipi 
... (544 chars skipped) ...
 Marcos in Martial Law tawh a gam a ukna hangin tua hun sungin Philippines in gamdangte a sumbat pen 1972 in $2.67bn panin 1986 in $28.2bn tung hi ci-in World Bank in ciamteh hi. (Obama’ aa sangin bel $10bn in tawm zaw sam ei). Marcos innkuanpih pen Philippine gam mite sum $5–10 billion thelthang sak hi kici hi. Vietnam War lai-in US ten gul matna dingin a khut in a zat uh ahi hi.

Bail
‘Bail’ chu jail tang leh thubuai nei mekten an thubuai ngaihtuah chhunga an chhuah lailawk theihna hi a ni a, an chhuah lailawk chhunga court leh thuneitu lama an inlan leh lan loh chungchanga mawphurtu (surety) leh sum chawi (bail bond) a awm thin bawk. India rama dan bawhchhiatna thubuai kalpuina dan bupui ber, Code of Criminal Procedure, 1973 (CrPC)-in a sawite hi han sawi zau ila.
Bailable Offence: Bailable offence-ah hian thubuai neite bail-a an chhuah phalsak ngei ngei hi an dikna cha
... (739 chars skipped) ... 
court thutluknaah thubuai neite bail-a an chhuah leh chhuah loh chu a innghat tihna a nih chu.
Anticipatory Bail: An laka non-bailable thubuai ziah luhten police-ina an man huna bail-a an chhuahna theihna turin man an nih hmain CrPC section 438-in a sawi angin bail an dil lawk thei a, chu chu anticipatory bail an ti. Criminal case tlanglawn – rukruk, zu leh drugs kaihnawih, pawngsual, adt.-ah hian case ziah luh a nih atangin rang taka police-ten thubuai neitute an man thuai theih avangin anticip
... (739 chars skipped) ...
omplaint sheet a thehlut hman lo a nih chuan court-in thubuai neite, an thubuai lian hle mah se, dan anga a chhuah ngei ngei a ngai thin. Kum 10 aia tlem loa hrem theih thubuai chu Investigation Officer-ten ni 90 chhungin an chhui zo tura tih an ni a, thubuai dang zawng chhui zawhna atan ni 60 an nei thung. Hemi hun chhunga an chhui zo lo a nih chuan thubuai nei (accused) chu danin a phut angin court-in bail-a a chhuah ngei ngei a ngai a ni.

Lawngtlai 08.05.2021 : Mizoram Kohhran Hruaitute Committee chuan May ni 8, 2021 inrinni zan dar 7:00- ah Mizoram pum tawngtai rualna nei turin kohhrante a hriattir a, kohhran mi, mitinte chuan mahni awm hmun atanga lo zawm turin a ngen
MKHC chuan “Tun laia kan ram dinhmun thlirin, Covid-19 hripui leng thawh hnihna avanga nitin hri kai thar kan pung leh thi kan pung chho mek hi pawi a ti tak meuh va.
He hripui leng hi a lo reh theih nan leh khuarel chhiatna chi hrang hrang laka kan him theih nan MKHC chuan May 8, 2021 inrinni zan dar 7:00 p.m.-ah ram pum huap tawngtai rualna neiha tihtak zeta Pathian auh ni se a tih a rel a.
He ram pum huap tawngtai rualna hi mahni awm hmun atanga lo zawm theuh turin mi tinte MKHC chuan mi ngena a ni” a ti.
MKHC chuan tawngtai thupui tur a siam a, hetiangin :
1. Sual thupha chawina
2. Pathian hrruaina kan chan avanga lawmthu sawina
3. Covid-19 hripui vei mekte an lo dam thuai theih nan
4.Damlo enkawltu doctor,nurse leh thawktu hrang hrangte tan
5. Covid-19 hripui leng hi a lo reh theih nan
6. Khuarel chhiatna hrang hrang laka kan him theih nan.
7. Kan thenawm ram Myanmar tualchhung buaina a lo reha mipui thlan sorkar tha tak an neih theih nan

Malsawmna leh duhsakna vannneihna kan chan te hi,
Khawi lam atangin nge maw a lo kal?
Engkim siam a enkawltu kan tlantu leh chhandamtu,
Malsawmna zawng zawng bul i lo ni e.
Aw Lalpa, theihtawp chhuahin thinlung in kan fak a che,
Malsawmna zawng zawng bul i nih vangin;
Hmangaihna leh lainatna, khawngaihna, chhandamna te,
Malsawmna zawng zawng bul i lo ni e.
Vanduaina a lo thlen in, hreawmna kan tuar pawh in,
Manganganna lungngaih kan tuar lai hian;
Hmangaihtu leh lainattu duhsaktu min pe zel a,
Malsawmna zawng zawng bul i lo ni e.
Lungngaihna leh harsatna, hreawmna kan tuar lai hian,
I hmangaihna rinhlelh tur a awm lo;
Hriatthiamna te min pe a, aw tlantu kan fak a che,
Malsawmna zawng zawng bul i lo ni e.
Aw Lalpa, kan fak a che, chawimawina ropuina te,
Kumkhua in i ta ngei tur a lo ni;
Vanramah min hruai hunah chatuanin kan fak ang che,
Malsawmna zawng zawng bul i lo ni e.

Lal khup : Lawm Mang nang mutpuak a khiatna na thei na?
Mang : Mutpuak cih ciang mut leng puak cihna, a puak thei cihna hilo dia.
Lal khup : Tuabel a kimu thei mutpuak hi.
Mang : Tua ahih leh a kimu theilo mutpuak om maw lawm?
Lal khup : Tam kisa nang zong na theih nailoh man hi.
Mang : Koi bang a hia? Hong gen dih ve.
Lal khup : A kimu theilo mutpuak cih ciang a, mi pen a hilo pi a, phat phat in, lungdam sak mahmah in a tawpna ah a hilo na ding pi a ma deihna na ah lawn ziau.
Mang : Aw tuate a kimu theilo mutpuak maw.

India ram pum huapa Chakma zirlai inzawmkhawm, All India Chakma Students’ Union chuan Mizoram Chief Minister Pu Lal Thanhawla chu NEET counselling-a tel tur Chakma zirlaite venhimna pe duh loah an puh.
AICSU chuan National Eligibility cum Entrance Test (NEET) hnuaia medical course zir tura inziak tlingte tan Zirtawpni khan counselling buatsaih nimahse, Chakma zirlai palite chu venhimna pêk an nih loh avangin an inlan thei lo niin an sawi a, counselling-a Chakma zirlaite an tel theih loh chhanah Mizoram Chief Minister chu an puh a ni.
Thuchhuah an siama an tarlan danin Zirtawpni zing lam khan Chakma zirlaite chuan Chief Minister chu hmuin counselling neihna hmun an thlen theihna tura anmahni venghim tur police an dil niin an sawi a, hei hi Chief Minister Pu Lal Thanhawla chuan a hnâwl niin an sawi.
Chief Minister bakah hian Chief Secretary leh Police department hotute hnenah pawh August ni 21 khan an sahimna tur ngaihtuahsak turin Chakma zirlaiten an lo thlen tawh niin AICSU-te chuan an sawi a, hei bakah hian Zirtawpni zing lam khan Aizawl SP pawh Chakma zirlaite counselling-a an inlan ngei theih nan venhimna pe turin an ngen bawk niin All India Chakma Students’ Union-te chuan an sawi.

Ei hmaa Autonomous District Council election hung um ding le inzawmin, Hmar Christian Leaders Forum chun, Kohran le Kristien ei nina anga ei thuoitu ding thlangna ei neina dinga hin thienghlim taka Pathien dit dana tawngtaina le inthlangna ei nei theina dingin hieng a hnuoia hai anga ei
thaw theina dingin, Mipui hai kuoma ngenna le inhriettirna siem a nih.
1. Zalen taka Mani vote seng indik taka thlak ding.
2. Thawluina le sum le pai hmanga vote zawng lo ding.
3. Vote zawng sung tukhawmin thukhel belchieng dawl lo le inhrietthiemnawna thei pawl le mimal kara khawm-a intlungtir thei thu hrim hrim the dar lo ding.
4. Kristien ringtu Kohran member seng ei ni leiin candidate le anni thangpuituhai tu el khawm election hnung chen khawma an hriet zing thei ding thilah thu thalo le thusie taluoa in dem amani in hrilsiet lo ding.
5. Polling Booth tinah a thei hram chun khawtlang thuoitu haiin vote thlak hmain Pastor amani Kohran Upa kovin tawngtaina in neitir nisien.
6. Polling Booth tina thusie hlasie a insel inhalna le in sukbuoina um lo le zu dawn buoi le inrui thei thil iengkawm thaw lova boruok tha tak le hadam tak hnuoia inthlang hi nei dingin mitin ngen le inhriettir ei nih.

Tuzing Saturday June 19 ah hin UN General Assembly nih Myanmar Military Dictatorship ahman nak kong ah Ralkap council sin ah states kip nih, Hriamnam zuarnak lei ah aho hmanh nih Myanmar sin ah zuar/bawm lo ding in “Resolation” pass asi ve cang.
Vote an laknak ah 119 ah Belarus long nih an pawm lonak vote athlak, Ram 36 Absent a um, Ram Absent chung ah India zong an itel ve apoi ngai, India Absent nak chan cu, ASEAN resolution 5 points an support ruang ah asi, India’s ambassador to the United Nations TS Tirumurti ” Myanmar kong ah hin, kan pawngkam ram hna nih support an pe tuk lem lo khi asi, Myanmar Resolution pass kong ah hin, Myanmar Democracy phan khawhnak lam a um hnga maw?
Myanmar ram kong ah Resolution antuah mi ah hin China , India & Russia hna hi absent ram chung ah alangbik mi hna an si, India nih cun ASEAN initiative on Myanmar & Five-Point Consensus kan support/pawmpi ati, Diplomatic engagement kan ngeih ah rule of law hmang in Political leaders le midang an tlaih mi hna chuah ding in hma kan lak peng lai ati.
India nih Myanmar Military council acoyah nih atu an cawlcang nak hi, kan doh bak mi asi, sualnak angei lo mi mipi hna chung ah hriamnam le tlaih hremnak ti bantuk hna hi, rule of law ning asi lo caah kan doh bak mi asi ati ko nain, UN Assembly ah cun kal loin Absent bak asi ko khah khuaruah har bak asi, vawlei cung ah Democracy ram ngan bik asi mi nih Myanmar ram democracy caah support apek lo hi apoi ngai khi asi.

National Mobile Monitoring System (NMMS) zirho
Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (MGNREGS) hnuaia hna hrang hrang thawktute vilna tur, National Mobile Monitoring System (NMMS) chungchang inzirtirna chu nimin khan Kolasib-ah neih a ni.
National Mobile Monitoring System (NMMS) hi Mobile Phone atanga hman tur niin MGNREGS hna te langtlang lehzual a thawh a nih theih nana duan a ni a, MGNREGS hnuai a hnathawktute kal dan a hmun ngei ah chhinchhiah a nih dawn bakah a viltu VEC/VLAA/Mates-te tan heng hnathawktu hming chhinchhiahte chu MGNREGS Software-ah rang zawkin a inthawn theih tawh dawn a ni.He ruahmanna thar hi tun thla, May 2022 atang hian hman a ni dawn a, hemi chungchang inzirtirna nimin-a Kolasib-ah neih ah hian Thingdawl RD Block hnuaia Village Council 17 atangin Village Employment Council, Village Level Administrative Assistant leh Mates-te an tel a ni.

October 6, Bangladesh: Leitlun refugees camp tumbik a si mi Cox’s Bazar District, Kutupalong refugees camp ih um Rohingya refugees bur hnih buainak ah minung 4 an thi ih 20 lenglo in hliamhma an tuar.
Hih hmun ih um refugees tamsawn cu 2017 kum Myanmar ramsung buai ṭum ih Rohingya raltlan pawl an siih minung an tam rualrual in buainak a tam sinsin.
Misual khal a burbur in an um ih ritsii zuarthup, hlawhhlang zuarawknak le thilfir suamawnak phunphun thawn buainak in a khat ih Lal cuhaw in misual a burbur in an buai ṭheu.
October 6 ih buainak khal cu Bangladesh palik in Rohingya refugees misual 9 an kai mi thu ah misual bur hnih mawh an puh aw ih meithal hrimhrei dangdang hmang in an buai naksatuk ruangah minung 4 an thi ih 20 langlo in hliamhma an tuar.
Cox’s Bazar district ih ṭuanvonei palik Md Rafiqul Islam (Administration) cun, “tuhlan ihsin hmunram uktu si duh ah misual a burbur in an buai ringring. Tuṭum Lombasia camp ih buainak khal ni tawkmawi a rei zo. Misual bur hnih kahawknak ah minung 4 an thi. An ruang kan va phorhsuak cu lubul khal an um” a ti.
Kan dung kum March thla ah security official in Rohingya refugees misual 7 an kap that ih tukum 2020 January thla khalah palik le misual kahawnak ah Rohingya refugees misual 4 an thi zo a si.
Hram:CNBC

Tuni August 21 ah Malaysia ram ah Covid-19 zawtnak ngeimi 9 an hmuhchap hna i zawtnak ngei hmuhmi dihlak 9,249 an si cang.
Malaysia Ngandamnak Vuanci Zung director-general Tan Sri Dr Noor Hisham Abdullah nih,”Covid-19 mizaw thar 9 lakah 5 cu ramchungah aa chawnmi an si. 4 hi ramdang ah zawtnak ngeicia in a rung tlungmi an si,” tiah tunih ah a chim.
Atu hi Kuala Lumpur khua chungah Covid-19 mizaw tampi hmuhnak hmun thar a um. “Maju cluster” tiin min an pek.
Maju cluster he aa pehtlaimi Covid-19 mizaw 3 an hmuh hna. Malaysia rammi 1 le ramdangmi 2 an si.
“Kuala Lumpur khualai pawngkam um rawl dawr kan duhnak pawl ah Covid-19 testnak kan tuah i August 16 ah rawl dawr rianttuan ramdangmi 2 sinah Covid-19 zawtnak rungrul kan hmuh.
“Anmah he aa chawnbiami kan hlat i an customer kum 42 simi Malaysia nu zong Covid-19 a ngei ve,” tiah Dr Noor Hisham nih a chim.
Ramchung ah zawtnak aa chawnmi 5 lakah 3 cu Kedah state i Tawar cluster in a si. Maju cluster in 1 le a ram ah kuat an timhmi ramdangmi pakhat a si.
Tuni ah Covid-19 zawtnak in a dam i sizung ttin termi 13 an si. Malaysia ram ah Covid-19 a umka in nihin tiang a dammi 8,943 an si cang.
Atu lio sizung ah Covid-19 a zaw liomi mizaw 179 an si. Mizaw zual zohkhenhnak (ICU) ah mizaw 7 an um i 4 cu hawihlei in an zual deuh caah ventilator bunhpiak an si.
Tuni ah Covid-19 in a thimi an um lo. A thimi cazin 125 ning a si.

Hun engemawchen Serchhip District-ah Covid-19 hri vanga nunna chân an awm loh hnuah nimin khan E.Lungdar khuaah Covid-19 hri kai pakhat a boral.
Serchhip District-a Covid-19 vanga nunna chân awm hnuhnun ber chu August ni 28, 2022 kha a ni a, nimin chawhnu dar 2:10 khan Khawlliani (79), E. Lungdar Zion Veng chu E. Lungdar PHC-ah Covid-19 vangin a boral a, Serchhip CMO Office aṭanga thu dawn danin Khawlliani hi May ni 3, 2023 khan Covid-19 a kai tih hriatchhuah niin, amah hi natna dang nei tel niin, E.Lungdar PHC-ah enkawl a ni a, nimin chawhnu dar 2:10 khan a boral ta a ni. Khawlliani hi Covid Vaccine dose 3 thlengin la a ni.
Heti hian Serchhip District-ah Covid-19 thihpui mi 37 an awm ta a ni.
Hetihlai hian nimin khan Serchhip District-ah Covid-19 hrikai hmuhchhuah thar mi pahnih an awm a, hri kai hmuhchhuah tharte hi East Lungdar leh Serchhip AOC Vengah pakhat ve ve an ni a, nimin khan hri kai zinga mi pakhat chu enkawl dam a ni a, tun dinhmunah Serchhip District chhunga hri kai hmuh chhuah tawh zawng zawng mi 14,656 niin, an zinga mi 14,603 enkawl dam an tawh a, hri kai enkawl lai mi 16 an awm mek a ni.

Nitin Milai Nun Thawn Pehtlai Mi Thutluknak:

Thusuhnak pawl:
Fimnak timi cu a tha bik hrilthiamnak asi.
1. Fimank timi cu ziang asi?
2. Milai in tidanglam theih lomi Pathian sersiam, amai thuneihnak hnuai ah a ret mi ziang pawl a um?
3. Pathian in ziangkim a sersiam ih ziang hmuahhmuah cu a thuneihnak hnuai ah a um ti asile ziangtin a sersiami parah Pathian duhlo zawngin (sual) a cang thei?
4.

asi:
1) Thlarau Thianghlim cu Thutak sungih Pathian duhnak thei thei dingin mi kaihruai tu asi, (John 16:8, 17:17)
2) Pathian cu mi zangfah tu asi vekin aduh zawng tuahsuak thei dingin ziangkim a tul mi cu in pek asi. II Pet. 1:3)
3) Pathian in amai duhzawng le thutak cu taimak suah in kan hawl ding a duh mi asi, (2 Tim 2:15)
4) Ziangkim thuthluknak kan tuah mi cu Pathian thu vekin, Thlarau Thianghlim kaihhruai nak hnuai ah kan tuah asi ti kan fiang awk asi ahcun a rah suak mi cu kan ruah lo pi

o ret sak sawn mi tuahsuak thei nak ding in hna a tuan rero asi ti theih hngilh lo a tha.
Daihnak: THuthluknak na tuah ih lunghmui ten Pathian hnenah na ap hnu ah thindai ten Pathian in ziangkim a tha mi a hlawhtlin ter ding asi ti zum ngam mei aw la hnangam ten um aw. Cuntin Pathian hnenah na thuthluknak tuah mi na ap hnu ah Pathian ih daihnak in na thinlung a lo luahkhat tikah na leitlun nun cu ziangvek na tong khal asile thin dai le hnangam zetin na can na hmang ringring ding asi (Col. 3:15).

Theihna in sepkhiatna
Mihing khat ii thutheihtel na in sepkhiatna pan in kithei hi. Tua ahih manin, hsepkhiatna in theihna kilahkhiatna ahihi. Mi te in natampi te bangci sepding, bangci bawlding cih thei in amau nasepna munmun uh ah siam in, khatveivei lamdang bang i sa phial hi. Bangci sepleng bangpiang dinga, bangci bawlleng, bang kingah thei cih thu te mite in, kinpen leh zonpen in aneih uh thu ahihi. Tua thu hangin, leitungah nate asangzaw asangzaw in kibawl toto a, mite theihna zong khangse
... (2019 chars skipped) ... 
n, mihing thum tukhawm lukituah liangmah tase leh, eima phone tektawh buai in, kuamah kiho man loliangin, zubuai sabuai in, buai hun sungah ilut ta hi.
Theihna in nasepna ah kimukhia ahih leh, hi cibang leitungah theihna tuamtuam hongkhan natawh kizui in dotna nih ihki dotden ding thupi hi.
(i) Katheih thu in kanuntak na hongpicingsak sepkhiatna hongpia taktak hiam?
(ii) Apicing nuntakna kaneihna dingin bang ka thei hiam?
Hih dotna nihte in mihingkhat adingin nakpi tak in athupi dotna ahihi. Atu
... (2019 chars skipped) ...
ei cihna ahihi. Tua ahih man in theihna in Thu hi a, Thu in Pasian ahihi (Jn 1: 1). Hih thu hangin, theihna khempeuh Pasian kiangpan hongpai thu tawh kizom ding a, THU ahi Pasian deihna leh, tua thutheihna in sepkhiatna, nuntakpihna tawh kilak khia ding ahihi. Hih thu hangin Pasian thu theihna, Pasian hongitna itheihna, Pasian hong hotkhianna itheihna cih theihna khempeuh in sepkhiatna, gamtat na tawh akilakkhia ding ahihi.
Rev Fr Damian Dal (Nimdildial)
Leuven, Belgium

... (408 chars skipped) ... 
k kher a ngai lo tia a thlavang hauh sak an awm bawk.

Hi mifim hna hi America i PhD degree a lami an si lo. Thlapa cung kaimi an si lo. Scientist an si lo. Anmah chan lio ah minung lei in fimnak cu an ngeih pah ttheu lai. Asinain kan ruahnak sawhsawh lawng asi. Baibal chung ah an fimnak kong tu kan i ruah hna lai.
1. Khuaruahhar arfi an hmuh in Messiah a chuah cang ti an hngalh khawh: June thla ah ruah a sur lai ti na hngalh. Zeitindah na hngalh khawh? Kum chiar

5. Zisuh an va ton i an biak: Jesuh a tongmi hi mifim bik kan si ko. Jesuh a biami hi mifim bik kan si ko. Jesuh a bia duh lo i, anawl a ngai duh lomi, thluachuah lawnglawng a halmi pawl hi midepde an si. Minung cu Jesuh kan ton i kan biak lawnglawng ah mifim k
... (1857 chars skipped) ...
 hna a hnawk khawh lonak lam in an kal cang. Jesuh kan ton cang e tihnu i Sehtan (Herod) umnak lei i a kal tthanmi cu mihrut an si. Mihrokhrawl an si.
Baibal nih mifim a timi hna cu Pathian nih mifim a timi hna an si. Nangteh Baibal nih mifim an ti ve hnga maw? Mi nih mihrut an in ti ko hmanh ah Pathian nih mifim an timi kha a biapi deuhmi asi. Pathian nih mifim an ti ahcun mifim na si. Credit: Aung Myint Thang

Saphu kawr hmanga sumdawng mi pahnih thiamloh chan tir
Aizawl February 23, 2024 : Ni 19.2.2024 (Thawhtanni) khan Judicial Magistrate First Class-II, Aizawl Judicial District chuan Saphu kawr (Pangolin Sales) hmanga dan lova sumdawnna a inhnamhnawih mi pahnih (2) te chu thiamloh a chan tir.
1) David Lalthutiama (56) S/o Lalthanzauva (L) Ainawn Veng, Aizawl leh
2) Lalvarsanga (33) S/o H. Zosiamliana, Sakawrdai, Aizawl District te chu Magistrate hian Rs. 10000 (Cheng singkhat) chawitirin a hrem a, an pawisa chawi tur hi an pe theilo anih chuan ni 90 chhung jail-tang (Simple imprisonment) tur an ni.
Thil sual ti tute hi 15.9.2023 khan EF&CC Department leh Wildlife Crime Control (WCCB) Govt. of India te tangkawpin manin Wildlife (Protection) Act, 1972 hnuaiah thubuai siamsak an ni a, man an nih lai hian hian Saphu kawr Kg. 24.3 an lo kawl a ni. Wildlife (Protection) Act 1972-ah chuan Saphu (Pangolin) hi Schedule 1 ah dah a nih avangin dan lova Saphu kawr hmanga sumdawngte chu Wildlfe (Protection) Act, 1972 Section 51 (1) in a sawi angin kumthum (3) atanga kum sarih (7) thleng Lungin tantir leh Rs. 25,000/- (singhnih) aia tlemlo chawitira hrem tur an ni.
EF&CC chuan Mizoram rohlu ramngaw leh nungchate nasa leh zuala humhalh kawngah leh dan bawhhchetute zawnchhua kawng mipuite thawhpui zel turin an ngen a ni.

Palik sakhan a hliammi an tam caah vanlei in kah a bawmh hna. Gangaw peng, Kan Kye khua I a ummi SAC palik sakhan an kah hna I a hliammi an tma ruang ah Vanlei in kahdohnak a vun bawm hna khuachung zong ah a kah chih kong khuami hna nih an chim.
March 31 zing sumilam 4 :00 am hrawng ah khan Gangaw peng PDF phu fonh hna nih Kan Kye khua I a ummi Palik sakhan cu an va kah hna hi a si. Sakhan an kah I a hliammi an tam hnu in SAC nih vanlei in Mi – 35 a vun thlah pinah Jet fighter zong voithum a phan, Mi – 35 in bomb voi hnih an thlak pinah Helicopter 2 in ralkap thazaang zong an chap fawn hna theih a si.
“Zaanlei suimilam 2 :00 pm tiang hi kahdohnak a pehzulh, a khawngmi zat cu fiang in theih a si lo, vanlei in kahdohnak a tuah ruang ah hin khuami hna inn pawl zong an kangh hna, cu hnu ah cun kahdohnak a dai, zeidah a can than lai cu chim khawh a si lo tiah PDF lei in rianngeitu pakhat nih cun a chim.
Zaan lei suimilam 5:00 pm hrawng zong ah khan Helicopter pakhat in thilri le thazaang a vun chap hna zong theih a si. Kan Kye Khua ah inn 2000 hrawng an um hna khuami hna cu an z ate tiawk in zing suimilam 4 :00 am khan a himnak ah an zaam hna. Hi kahdohnak ah hin kaphnih in a khawng mi le a hliammi an tam men lai tiah zumh a si.

Manipur-a Kekru Naga thingtlang khuaah Zirtawpni liam ta khan Army-ten National Socialist Council of Nagaland- Isak Muivah (NSCN-IM) tawmbuk an chhuhsak a, hel pakhat an man bawk.
Indian Army Eastern Command chuan hemi chung chang hi Twitter-ah tarlangin NSCN-IM tawmbuk an chhuhsak thu leh ralthuam eng emaw zat an man tih an tarlang a ni.
Helte hian Zirtawpni khan Kekru Naga khuaa Nungba khuaah hian pawi an khawih nia tarlan a ni a, hemi report an dawn hnu hian sipaite hian beihpui an thlak chhunzawm a, hel tawmbuk hi an chhuhsak ta tih an sawi.
NSCN-IM hel pakhat chu a uniform hnutchhiahin mipui zingah tualchhung mi anga awm a tum a, mahse an manchhuak tho tih defence thupuangtute chuan an sawi bawk.
Hel tawmbukah hian M16 pakhat round 125 la awm, SLR pakhat, AK round 26 leh hmanraw dang eng emaw zat la awm chu an man a ni.
Defence Ministry chuan hel laka beihpui thlakna kawngah hian security force-te leh police-te chu an thawk ho ṭha hle tih an sawi a, intelligence agency, tualchhung thuneitute leh tualchhung mite nen pawh an thawhhona a ṭha hle tih an sawi.
Security force-te hian beihpui hi an la thlak chhunzawm zel a ni.
Manipur-ah hian nasa takin hel laka beihpui thlak mek a ni a, India sipaite mai bakah Myanmar sipai-te pawhin hel laka beihpui thlakte hi an thawhpui a ni.

Myaung peng chung nitlaklei kahnak ah ralhrang 10 an kah thah hna i PDF pahnih nunnak a liam ve.
Magwe ramthen Myaung peng nitlak lei i kahnak ah ralhrang lei minung 10 an thi i PDF pasaltha pahnih nih ramle miphun caah nunnak an pek ve.
Nizan ralhrang he i kahnak cu chun nitlak dengmang a rau. Ralhrang pawl cu PDF nih Sow Win khuapawng in an bWh hna i an kah hna. A thimi ralhrang ruak pawl cu ralhrang lei nih an char kho hna lo tiah phah/kah- Phah PDF nih an thanh.
Mipi ralkap PDF lei in pahnih nunnak a luam i pakhat nih a faktuk lo in hliamhma a pu.Ralhrang lei hi a tlawmbik in minung 10 an kah thah hna i tampi nih hliamhma an tuar rih, nain zeizat ngai sn si lai timi cu People Spring nih kan fehter kho lo tiah an tial.
Ralhrang lei hi milu thazaang 80-100 karlak tluk an si lai. Soewin khuakam ah PDF nih hriamngan 80, 120 mahmah in an kah hna tiah blackgod nih cathanh an chuah.Source-People Spring

Norway Ram Ah NATO Phu Nih Raltuk Ningcang Cu Topui Taktakin An Cawng!
Ukraine cu Russia nih kahdohnak a tuah cuahmah lio le buainak a linsat lioah Nyitoe chungtel phu nih cun Norway ram ah raltuk ningcang ropui taktakin an tuah.
Cu raltuk ningcang cawnnak ahcun ram 27 an i tel i, minung thong 30000 an i tel tiah theih a si.
Cupinah Nyitoe chungtel ram silomi Sweden le Phinland ram zong nih an ralkap zeimawzat an i tel ve i, April (1) ah an dih te lai tiah theih a si.
Raltuk ningcang an cawnnak ahcun Norway ram cu kahdoh a tongmi bantukin an tuah i, France, Poland, Spain ram i an ralkap hna nih Norway ram thlanglei sakhan in rianrang taktakin lehrulhnak an tuah ve.
Hi kahdohnak cu kum 2006 thawkin kumfatin tein an rak tuah cang i, Ukraine cu Russia nih a kahdohnak kong he zeihmanh aa pehtlai lo tiah Norway ralkap nih cathanh an chuah.
Asinain Nyitoe chungtel phu fonhmi hruaitu bogyokegyi Rob Bauer nih cun harsatnak le kahdohnak zual taktak ton caan ah tiin timhlamhnak kan tuahmi a si i, ruah bal lomi zong atu cu ruah caan a si cang tiah a chim.
Crd: Voice of Myanmar

A nemmi thilri, tunu, chantling, puan, rizai, tuuphaw, asiloah nau thlimnak bawm a kham a ummi pawl cu naute ihnak hmun in a lenglei ah chiah hna.
Thutdan a nemmi asiloah sofa, chantling, rizai, tuuphaw, asiloah puan bantuk a nemmi pawl ah zeitik hmanh ah naute cu ih ter dingin chiah hlah.
Naute cu a fekmi* thil hmai ah an keng lei in chiah tikah an itmi a him deuh. Ihnak caan vialte an biapi dih. Chikhat te caah siseh zaan ah siseh naute cu ih ter dingcaah amah nu asiloah pa cu a keng lei in chiah hna.
*A fekmi ihnak hmai ah himnak caah fehter cang mi nau thlimnak bawm, nau ihnak, le thial khawhmi lentecelhnak hmun pawl aa tel lai.
Naute ihnak caah a him bikmi hmun cu nau tlimnak bawm chungah asi. Himnak caah fehter cangmi nau tlimnak bawm ah aa zami a khuh khuhmi ihphah bantuk, a fekmi ihnak hman hna.
Mawtaw thutnak, puaknak, thuinak, asiloah cubantuk thil hna cu naute nifatin ihnak hmun caah hmang hna hlah.
Na naute ngandam tein le him tein chiah dingcaah na tuah khawhmi tampi a um.

Apa thawng atang anu Motor accident nak in athih ruangah kum 12 Malaysia pahngakchia Muhammad Aiman Syazwan Mohd Fouzi nih anau le pa 5 kum 2 in kum 10 karlak a zohkhenh nak hna thawngpang cu ram chungah avun thang tatak.
Fouzi nu hi Bank ah riantuan mi asi, kan hnung thla ni 25 ah khan rian i a ttin pah ah Sungai Baru ah accident atong i arak thi, Fouzi pa hi thawng atang.
kum 12 mi Fouzi nih hin far 4 le ahngakchia bik kum 2 mi naupa angeih hna, Social warefare department nih an komh nak “ka nu nih hin zing kan thawh ka ah breakfast akan chuan piak i arian akal hlan ah siangin ah akan chiah ta, siangin kan ttin caan ah avun kan lak i cun arian apeh than”
“arian ruangah in ah akan umpi khawh peng lo caah ka nu nih ka nau le zohkhenh ning aka cawnpiak i anih zong hna ngam te in achuak tawn i ka nu um lo kar ah ka nau le tha te in ka rak zoh khenh hna, ei din an duh mi noodle le arti le thil dang pawl ka chuan piak tawn hna” tiah achim.
Biahal nak an tuah mi, “atu ah kum 12 te lawng na si i na nau le minung 5 zohkhenh nak dingah na lung a dong maw?” tiah bia an hal mi cu “ka lung a dong lo, ka nu nih kan thih tak hmanh selaw ka nau le hi tha te in ka zohkhenh hna lai, ka pa Thawng atlak ruangah zoh khenh tu kan ngei lo i ka nau le hi ka thih tiang ka zoh khenh hna lai” tiah aleh hna.
Social Warefare nih bawmh nak phaisa Rm.300 an pek i apa far kum 43 mi Nor Azila Sahran anu au rual pa 6 zohkhenh ding in a umpi hna.

Vawiin chawhnu dar 1:30 khan Serchhip ah Mizoram State Tobacco Control Society chuan Serchhip NGO hrang hrang hruaitu te tan Sub-Headquarters YMA Office, Serchhip ah training a buatsaih a, he hun hi Pi Vanlalzari, District Coordinator, MSTCS in a hmanpui a ni.
Vawiin Training ah hian vaihlo that lohna hrang hrang bakah Vaihlo Khuahkhirhna Dan – COTPA chipchiar taka zirho a nih bakah Mizoram chhung District hrang hrang ten Vaihlo khuahkhirhna dan an zawm that dan zirchianna “Compliance Study” a ni bawk a, he Study in a tarlan dan hian Serchhip District chu COTPA dan zawm kawngah an ti tha thawkhat hle a, Puipunna a meizu an awm leh awm loh tehna ah phei chuan an titha hle a ni. Hei bakah hian Global Adult Tobacco Survey 2009-10 in Vaihlo hman kawnga Mizoram dinhmun hrang hrang a tarlan te zirhona neih niin he survey in a tarlan dan chuan Mizo mipui te chu India rama vaihlo hmang hnem ber niin mipui za a 67 (67%) lai in vaihlo kan hmang mek a ni. Hei bakah hian GATS - 2nd Phase kan hma lawka kan hmachhawn leh tur atan inpuahchahna tha neih dan tur sawiho ani bawk a ni.

Palikbu pa le singneipa ~ Lian Tuang
2016 kum khuakhal ni sat mahmah hun laitak khat in ka nasepna station ah tuilum hawp in lawmte tawh ka kihoho uhi.
Tua laitakin cycle 2 tawh palik 3 uniform silh sitset in zum huang sung ong lut vatvat uhi. Mi khat a khut lehhen sa in ong lutpih uhi. Amau nung deuhah singpua mawtawpi khat ong pai vuavua hi. Palikte in singpua mawtaw le singneipa a man ahi hi.
Zum mai ah mawtaw khawlsak uhi. Palikbu pa le singneipa ko kiangah ong tawlnga hi. A dang tengin mawt
... (1178 chars skipped) ... 
i. Palikbu pa in tua na gen pa singkholna ah nung nipi ka pai uh leh gam mang hiau ung in baih kei cih san lai hi. Singneipa in gam man nading om hetlo, ko singkholna gal hi, ko lam ong tawn le uh cin nai mahmah ci lai hi. Agen kawmkawm in a min zong gen kha zelzel hi. Palikbu pa in bangmah lamdang a sa hetlo dan om hithiat den lel hi.
Nitak lam ciangin singneipa le sing mawtawte palik zumah paipih uh a, ko kiangah palikbu le a dang khat ong om lai uhi.
Kei zong palikbu pa gei nehphei in ka hopi
... (1178 chars skipped) ...
 sangin upmawh theihna tungah kinga zaw uhi. Nang le kei bel I tua cih loh ding thupi ding hi a cih kawmkawm in ong paisan hi.
Hih thupiang le palikbu pa kammalte in ka ngaihsutzia le ka thupomzia tampi ong khel hi.
Tua mah bangin tu laitaka i buaipih theihzel ahi, minam vai, biakna vai, kipawlna vai, nasepna vai, lawmta vai, innkuan sung vai le vai tuamtuam thu hamsa pawl khatte ah zong hih thute phawkhuai thei kha dingin lamen i hih manin a gelhkik i hi hi. Lian Tuang

Zirlai sâwmah \hen a ni a. Pathian ni vawi hnih a awm avângin Pathian ni zîngah sermon thupui tur pahnih dah a ni bawk. Chutianga kan inenfiah a, kan kristian nun kan hmuhfiah tak tak chuan, “I ram lo thleng rawh se,” tiin tlâng kan kâwm dâwn a ni. Kan ram a dam lo, kan ti fo \hîn. MNF sawrkar ah Assam Rifle an inluling tih sawi
Mizoram Assembly-a Congress Member, C. Ngunlianchunga chuan MNF sawrkar hnuaiah Assam Rifle an inluling hle nia sawiin, Mizoram Police-te zahawmna humhim tura hma la tura sawrkar a phut thu a sawi.
Nimin-a Statement a siamah C. Ngunlianchunga chuan MNF sawrkar hnuaiah Mizoram Police-ten zah an kai tawk lo nia sawiin, tunhnaiah ringawt pawh Assam Rifle lamin vawi engemawzat Mizoram Police te hmalakna an palzut niin a sawi a. September 10, 2020 zan d
... (197 chars skipped) ... 
eizure List pawh fel taka siam vek a ni tih a sawi a. Hetihlai hian heng Kuhvarah te hi Siachangkawn-ah 17th Battalion Assam Rifle duty te’n zing dar 1:00 velah lo man nawn lehin, Mizoram Police hnen atangin an chhuhsak tih a sawi a. Lawngtlai SDPO-in Bualpui OC a tir chungin Assam Rifle lam nen an inbe rem thei lova, Mizoram Police lam hi an inthiarfihlim ta zawk a, Kuhvarah te pawh Assam Rifles lam hian Lunglei-ah phurin Assam Rifle man angin chanchinthar-ah puanzar a ni zui ta nghe nghe tih a
... (197 chars skipped) ...
ngte-a COVID-19 Testing Check Gate-ah Mizoram Police-te palzutin an lo tlan tlang lui tawh a, Zokhawthar lamah Mizo sumdawngte bungrua vawi tam tak man sakin, an lo buai phah tawh bawk tih a sawi a. Assam Rifle-ten MNF sawrkar an ngam em em mai chu a mak hle nia sawiin, sawrkarin Mizoram Police leh mipui thlavang a hauh nat ngam loh vangah a ngaih thu a sawi a. “MNF sawrkar hnuaiah Mizoram Police-te zahawmna nasa taka a tlahniam ta hi a pawi ka ti takzet a ni,” a ti bawk.

Mizoram hmun dangdang pawl ah August 26 zaan ih ruah a sut tamtuk ruangah leimin in harsatnak an tuar. Mi thi le hliam tarMizo Special Report sirhsan in a tanglam pawl hi tuini tiang Aizawl le a kiangkap ih harsat an tuarnak hmun hrekkhat a si thu kan thei.
- Ramhlun Venthar thlanmual a hrek deuhthaw in a minih thlan ziang maw tizat khal a siat bal.
- Chaltlag lily veng thlanmual khal ah thla 50 tluk a siat tiin theih a si.
- Hunthar Veng ih Singson Petrol Pump ihsin leilung a tlakniam theunak hmun hi meter 100 tluk ih sau le a sanlan meter 5 tluk in a tla niam ih, innsang 6 pawl khal an thawnawk phah zo. Mawtaw cu a feh thei nan pahnih cu an pial aw thei lo.
- Hunthar Veng le Edenthar veng tidai laknak Chanmari West ih Chhawnzinga Tikhuah cu a tlun lam leiin a min thluh ih a kiang ih PHE quarter khal a ti siat thluh.
- Seling le Tuirini karlak Chamhai zin khal a pit.
- Ramhlun South BCM Biak Inn le Tuikhurhlu karlak ih leimin in Maruti Van le Bike a a silh cih.
- Bawngkawn le Thuampui karlak Red Rose phei, Zokaia workshop kiang khal fehtlang theilo in a pit ih leimin in Truck le Two wheeler a nen.
- Bawngkawn ihsin Thuampui karlak ziin tlun sawn ih um Assam Type inn 2 a siat ruangah lampi a pit ih fehtlang theih a silo.

National Pension Scheme (NPS) leh Atal Pension Yojana (APY) a inziak lut chu 23 per cent-a pungin 6.24 crore lai March 4 thleng khan an inziak lut tawh tiin Finance Ministry chuan a tarlang.
APY subscriber ah punna 28 per cent niin customer 1 crore chuang an awm tawh a. NPS hnuaia total pension assets under management (AUM) leh APY chu March 4, 2023 thleng khan 23.45% a pungin Rs 8.82 lakh crore a ni tawh bawk.
“March 4, 2023 thlengin National Pension System (NPS) a subscriber punna pawh 22.88% 
... (37 chars skipped) ... 
in an pun belh a” tiin ministry chuan a tarlang bawk a. Nikum March 31 thleng khan NPS subscriber chu March 31, 2022 thleng khan 5.20 crore a tling a.
Subscriber 6.2 crore atanga 23.86 lakh leh 60.72 lakh te chu central leh state sorkar employee te an ni a. Corporate subscriber chu 16.63 lakh an awm thung a.
APY subscriber chu 28.4 per cent ah pungin March 4, 2023 thleng khan 4.53 crore an awm bawk a.
APY hi sorkar chuan June 1, 2015 atanga a kalpui tan kha niin worker te hnena social security p
... (37 chars skipped) ...
i te an ni a. He scheme subscriber te hian minimum guaranteed pension Rs 1,000 atanga Rs 5,000 thla tin kum 60 an pelh hnuah an contribution milin an dawng thei dawn a ni. Mahse, October 1, 2022 atang khan income taxpayers te chuan APY hi an hman ve phalsak an ni ta lo thung.
National Pension System (NPS) bi hi chu organised sector te tan ni deuh bikin sorkar hnathawk centre leh state te tan a ni deuh bik a, APY erawh hi chu hnathawk tawh phawt a bik takin unorganised sector ami te a huam thung.

Health care worker dinhmun in Falam le Covid – 19 thlirnak
Covid 19 thawn pehpar in khawsung huap ih cangvaihnak ṭhazet nei mi khua a si.
Ka sim suallo a si le Chin ram pumhuap ih Volunteer neiṭhabik khua khal a siih Quarantine khum mi pawl khal rilrawng in an ret dahlo. (Ei le inn hrang hlutu zar ah – Ṭuan ṭha hai sehla zo hman in an bawm duh lo ding)
Kawlram sungih covid – 19 nat hmuh hmaisabik ni ihsin daan le dun an thlun ih leng suakvak khalle kuthruh le hmurkhuh bunlotu an um lo ti tluk a si.
Sizung mina vehaw loding tiih daan suahmi khal an thlun ih mina besiatuk ti baklo cu veihvaitu hmuh ding khal an um lo.
Khawsung ah nathrik umlo dingih sii kap pawl khal hnaṭuan an teimak ih mah te kap thei zung tiang khal in an va kap sak thotho.
Pawlkom tete le zung pawl khalin daan an thlun zetih taksa tahnak non contact thermometer khal tlunlam thusuah vekin kan ṭul tiin tuletu rori an ra lak ringring a si.
Hmailam caan khalah tuṭum vekih lungrualnak, teimaknak le tlawmngainak lungthin kan neih thei cun a harhdam mi khua a si dingih FALAM a mawi sinsin ding.

(The Seven Wonders of the Ancient World)
Hlan san leitlun ih mangbangza pasarih hi Greek ttong hmannak khawvel ah Jesuh khrih piansuah hlan kum zabi malte ihsin a rung suak mi cazin a si. Himi mangbangza pasarih cazin hi thiamzunglam themthiamnak (arsistry) simaw, a dinsuahnak hrangih engineering lam thiamnak langsarnak simaw, an tung le phei kauhnak simaw ihsin an hril suah mi an si.
Mangbangza pasarih cazin rak tuahtu hi mi tampi an um nan Sidon mi Antipater (Antipater of Sidon) le Byzantim mi
... (2769 chars skipped) ... 
um le hminthang bik a si. Egypt ram uktu Greek siangpahrang pakhat hrangih dinsuah mi a si ih, sakserlam santhuanthu ah sang ding hrimhrim ih saksuah hlawhtlin hmaisatbik mi building a si.
Sakserlam mangbangza cazin tuah idea hi Alexander Ropi in zabi pali BC ih (anmai’ an rak theih mi) leitlun hmun tamsawn a neh ihsin an run neih mi a si. Ziangahtile Alexander Ropi in ram tampi a neh tikah Greek miphun khualtlawng pawl cu anmah hnakih nunphung hlun sawn neitu Egypt miphun, Persian miphnun le Ba
... (2769 chars skipped) ...
n theih mi simaw, hmuh mi simaw, lawng an cazin ah an rak telh thei ruangah mangbangza pasarih hi leitlun pumpuluk ih thil ropibik an si thluh lo ti theih a si. An umnak ihsin peng thawng khat hrawng a hla mi China ih Hruangdawl Ropi tla hi ra hmu hai sehla cun an cazin cu a danglam deuh tengteng ding.
Egypt Hloh-zin-kual (The Egyptian Labyrinth = Kawl ih win-ka-ba an timi) khal hlan san leitlun ih sakserlam hlawhtlinnak hmuahhmuah hleih thluh theitu a si ding tiah a ruattu an um fawn.

Thailand cozah nih Kawlram pawl cu Thai cozah nawl buar ruang ah an rak tleih hna I Myah-Oo-Hti lei ah an rak kuat hna. Cu an tleih mi hna chung in minung 11 cu thongtla mawtaw in an kal pi hna lio ah an zam nain minung 2 cu an tleih than hna tiah thawngtheih a si.
Hi minung 11 hna hi Thailand ram phungbuar mi le phungning loin Thailand ramchung ah a lut mi an si tiah sualphawt mi an si hna caah May 2 ah khan Myiah-Oo-Hti police sakhan lei an an rak kuat than mi hna an si. Cu an kal pi hna lio ah cun mawtaw in an zuang hna I minung 11 cu an zam hna nain minung 2 cu an tleih than khawh hna hi a si.
Cu ruang ah Thailand-Myanmar ramri vialte cu security police pawl nih an phihkhar dih I a hohmanh luh chuah nak nawl an pe hna lo.
Covid-19 ruang ah May thla chung ah Thailand ram I rian a tuan mi hna Myanmar miphun pawl cu Myiat-Oo-Hti ah an kuat cang mi hna May 1 ah minung 60, cun May 2 zong ah khan minung 54 an si cang hna. Hi hna pawl hi ni 21 chung hmundang teah an ngandam nak zohfel nak tuah an si lai tiah zong Myiat-Oo-Hti pengkulh hruaitu a si mi U The Za Aung nih a chim.
Myanmar ram ah rak kir ding khawh nak ding ah hin Thailand hrambunh Myanmar Embassy theih pinak tel loin May 2 ah khan pumpak motor cu manfak ngai in an hlan hna I Bangkok in Kawlram ah a rak lut mi hna zong minung tamngai kan um hna tiah ai tel ve mi pakhat nih a chim.

Mizoram State Sorkar Notification No.B.12021/10/04-TRP Dt.22.8.2017 leh section 15 & 117 of MV Act, 1988-in thuneihna a pek angin, S.P Traffic Aizawl chuan lirthei hmangtute him nan leh hnathawktu ten hna tha taka an thawh theih nan ahnuaia tarlan ang hian lirthei tlan dan tur ruahmanna thar a siam.
Ni 1.6.2017 atang hian SIPMIU (NERCCDIP), Aizawl ten Aizawl Venglai, Zirtiri College bul atangin Electric Veng panna kawng (Electric Road-III) ah Sewerage Pipeline phum hna an thawh dawn avangin helai kawngah hian Zing dar 9:30 atanga Tlai dar 5:00 inkarah lirthei engchi mah tlan phal a ni lo. Helai kawngah hian hnathawh tibuai thei turin kawng sirah lirthei eng chi mah din/dah (park) phal a ni lo.
He thupek hian hnathawh zawh a nih hma chu a huam ang. Hei hian chhiatrupna thil kangmei leh emergency kaihhnawiha duty leh Dan leh Thupek pawimawh bika Duty-te chetvelna a huam lo ang. He thupek hi a tul dan a zirin Traffic Police ten an ti danglam thei ang.

Vawiin chawhma dar 10:00 khan Serchhip DC Conference hall-ah District Election Officer, Pi Sangchhin Chinzah, MCS kaihhruaina in Serchhip Districta MP Inthlannaa hman tur Electronic Voting Machine leh Voter Verifiable Paper Audit Trail (VVPAT) Commissioning (hman theih tura buatsaih) neih a ni a, he hunah hian political party hrang hrang aiawh te leh EVM siam tu Electronics Corporation of India Limited (ECIL) Engineer mi 6 te bakah Pu Chuauhnuna, Dy. DEO, Pu Vanlalhmachhuana, Election Officer leh Election Official mi pawimawh dangte an tel a ni.
Serchhip District ah hian vote thlakna hmanrua Ballot Unit (BU) 122, Control Unit (CU) 121 leh VVPAT 113 kawl mek a ni a. Chung zing atang chuan 26 - Serchhip AC a hman turin Ballot Unit - 23 (Reserve-8), Control Unit - 23 (Reserve - 8) leh VVPAT - 23 (Reserve - 7) ruahman a ni a. 27 - Tuikum AC a hman turin Ballot Unit - 29 (Reserve - 16), Control Unit - 29 (Reserve -1 6) leh VVPAT - 29 (Reserve - 12) ruahman niin, 28 - Hrangturzo AC atan Ballot Unit - 25 (Reserve - 12), Control Unit -25 (Reserve - 12) leh VVPAT - 25 (Reserve - 9) ruahman niin, a vaiin Ballot Unit – 77 (Reserve - 36), Control Unit – 77 (Reserve – 36), VVPAT – 77 (Reserve – 28) ruahman a ni a. Heng bakah hian Awareness Campaign leh Training atana hman turin Ballot Unit 9, Control Unit 8 leh VVPAT 8 dah a ni bawk a ni.

Netherlands ram Utrecht khawpui chhunga Rail pakhat chhungah mi pakhat hian silai a kap chiama, mi pathum an thi a, panga an hliam a ni. Tin hemi pawikhawihtu ni ngeia an rin chu darkar tam tak an um hnuah chuan an man thei ta a ni.
An man hi Turkey rammi a ni a, Gokman Tenis kum 37 mi a ni. Tun tuma silai kah hi Netherlands thuneitute chuan inbeihna hlauhawm bera puangin an ram mipuite chu englai pawha inralring turin Netherlands prime minister Mark Rutte chuan a sawi.
Mahse Turkeya awm Gokman chhungkuate chuan mifirfiakte chet dan nilovin chhungkaw thil avanga kap a nih an ring a ni.

Yangon ramthen, Kamaryaut peng no.3 sang Thantapin lam le Saedanatuh lamkar inn number 17 ah dalan tiah ruahmi thawngpe si hrim lai tiah mitam nih ruahmi U Tin Hlah cu nihin zinglei suimilam 5:00 hrawngah meithal in kah a tong tiah Kamayut Information thawngzamhnak nih an langhter.
Tuzing suimilam 5:99 hrawngah an pawngkam mi pakhat chimnak ahcun au thawng ka theih caah ka va zoh cu a cal ah meithal in kah a rak tong” tiah a hmu tu mi pakhat nih a chim. Yangon Khit Thit Media nih Kamaryaut peng khuami pakhat cu pehtlai in thawng hal a si tik ah ralhrang sin thawngpe tu dalan tiah ruahmi U Tin Hlah thah a tonnak kong cu, thawng dik a si ko tiah theih a si, nihin zinglei ah ralhrang phu hna le palik nih runvengtu tampi hna he motor in an phan tiah a hmutu pakhat nih a chim.
Kamayut Information thawngzamhnak nih an langhter ning ah nihin suimilam 8:00 thok in Thantapin lam ah (motor ngan pakhat Dc 5, inn cit mi motor pakhat) he palik le ralhrang phu minung 30 leng cu, cu thil can nak hmun ah an phan i an pawngkam zong ah kherhhlai nak an tuah tiah theih a si.

North Korea ramin nuclear bomb a en chhin a\anga chawlhkar hnih pawh a liam hmain, t<kin khan missile a kap chhuak leh a, missile hian Japan ram a thlawh khum leh a ni. South Korea chuan North Korea hi chhang let nghalin, missile pahnih a kap chhuak ve a ni. South Korea sipaite sawi danin, missile hi North Korea khawpui, Pyongyang-a Sunan district a\angin Korea ram sanaa tukin zing dar 7 vel khan kah chhuah a ni a, a hma ang bawkin Japan rama Hokkaido thliarkar thlawh khumin, km 770-a sang, km 3,700-a thui a thlawh hnuah Hokkaido bula tuifinriatah a tla a ni. Japan PM, Shinzo Abe-a chuan North Korea hi na taka demin, a chet dan hlauhawm tak chu en liam a tum loh thu leh a palzam theih loh thu a sawi a, US Secretary of State, Rex Tillerson-a pawhin North Korea hi na taka sawiselin, America leh Japan rawtna angin, UN Security Council \hut khawm koh nghal a ni. Puan tawh angin, thla hlui ni 29-a North Korea missile kah chhuah khan Hokkaido thliarkar hi a lo thlawh khum tawh a, missile hi km 550 vela sang, km 2,700-a thui a thlawh hnuah Pacific tuifinriatah a tla a ni.

New Delhi-a Sorkar pawimawhte umzuia cham mek, Education Minister Pu. Lalsawta chu nimin chawhnu khan Sorkar laipuia School Education & Literacy Secretary Pu R. Bhattacharya nen inkawmna hun tha tak neiin, a hnuaia Department pawimawh hrang hrangte an sawiho. Hindi zirtirtu 1,305 hlawh, thla li lai an lak theih tawh loh thuah August thla chhunga rawn pek an intiam a, rualbanlote zirtirtu (IEDSS teachers) ten kum hnih lai hlawh an lak theih tawh loh pawh a rang thei ang bera tihfel a tiam bawk. Zirtirtu thlan dan, Teachers’ Eligibility Test (TET) neih thuah Mizoram bikin harsatna kan neihte leh Vocational Education kalpui dana remfel ngaite sawi dunin, hengte hi Secretary chuan lo enfel pui a tiam a ni.
Hetih lai hian kum 2009-a Mizoram Sorkarin Education Reforms Commission a din, Sorkar pawhin tih hlawhtlin tura a lo pawm tawh atanga DPR siam kal zelah tun hnai hian NEC atangin Mizoram Sorkar chuan cheng vaibelchhe engemawzat hmuh a beisei a. Mizoram Sorkarin DPR Rs. 815 crores zet a siam chu phase li ah thenin phase khat atan Rs. 272 crores a siam chhuak a. Hei hi Planning Commission, DoNER Ministry leh NEC-ah sem a thehluh leh a ni a, NEC hian hma an rawn hruai dawn niin hriat a ni bawk.

Rev. Arthur Carson le a nupi Laura Hardin Carson cu American Baptist Mission nih Lairam ah an hunthlah hmasa mi hna an asi. Hakha ah 15th March 1899 ah an phan. 1905 kum, missionary rian an tuannak kum nga hnu ah theipar an hmuhmi hna cu Pau Suan le a nupi Kham Ciang, Thuam Hang le a nupi Dim Khaw Cing khuasak khua mi an si. Tidim ah Dr.East nih May 11, 1905 ni ah tipilnak a rak pek hna. An Mah hna hi Laitlang ah khrihfa hmasa bik mi le Tipil nak a rak ing hmas bik mi cu an si.
Cu lioah hin Carson cu United States a tlawn lio asi. Dr. East nih a thinlung dihumnak in a chim mi cu “hi hi Laitlang ah theipar hmasa bik kan hmuh mi an si, thazaang a kan pek caah kan thinling a thuhnak bik in Pathian kan thangthat tiah achim.
Dr. East Khuasak ah a voi hnihnak zumtu thar hna tipil pek nak a ngei than. Teddim pengah, zumtu tipil a ing mi hna hi minung 11 ansi. Khuasak ah cun 17th February 1906 Khrihfabu a dirh. A Thaizing Zarhpini, February 18,1906 ah Bawipa zanriah pek nak cu Dr. East nih a tuah pi hna.
Mah hi hi kan laitlang ah Khrihfa mi hmasa bik mi hna cu an si. Zeitin dah Laitlang ah Khrihfabu an rak dirh ning hna hi an siti timi hna cu thaizing zingka te ah tial than khaw kan van I zuam te lai.

Lal Hriatrenga Chhangte in Chief Minsiter hlui leh Serchhip bialtu MLA hlui, Lal Thanhawla laka Affidavit diklo thehlut-a a puhna thubuai chu nimin khan ngaihtuah zawh niin Oct. 3 khian thutlukna puan a ni ang.
Kum 2013 MLA in-thlanpui neih dawna Serchhip bial-a Candidate, Lal Thanhawla’n Affidavit diklo a thehlut nia Lal Hriatrenga Chhangte in a puh avanga January 17, 2018-a Serchhip District Court-a thubuai thehluh hi nimin khan Serchhip District Court-a Judicial Magistrate First Class, JH. Lalparmawii hmaah ngaihtuah leh a ni a, he hunah hian thubuai thehluttu, Lal Hriatrenga Chhangte leh Ukil te bakah Lal Thanhawla Ukil te inlanin thubuai chung-changa thuremna chu thla thar Oct. 3, karleh Ningani-ah puan tura tih a ni.Chhiar Hlawhte
Sawrkarin inkharkhip chhunga inkaihhruaina a siam tharah Lo lama feh leh ramhnuai a chaw-hmeh zawn bakah chawhmeh tur sawngbawlte khuahkhirhna a hlip.
Sawrkar Laipui Scheme, PM-GKAY hnuaiah AAY (Ration Card eng) leh PHH (Ration Card pawl) Beneficiary te tan Buhfai mi pakhat zelah thla khat atan Kg. 5 zel a thlawn a sem tura ruahman a ni a. April leh May, 2020 quota chu a ruala sem tur a nih avangin mi pakhat zelah Kg. 10 (April & May atan) allotment siam turin Director, FCS&CA chuan DCSO zawng zawng chu a hriattir a. He Allotment hi April 27, 2020 (Thawhtanni) atanga May 9, 2020 inkarah Retailer ten mipui hnenah an sem ngei theih nan Supply Centre atanga pekchhuah hman tum a ni.

Spain ram football club hminthang Real Madrid cu dan pahbal ih player an hman ruangah Copa del Rey (Spain Siangpahrang Cup) ihsin an suahter thu Eurosport in a tarlang.

SAC ralhrang hnenih mi zuarthlai hmang, GA cazi an kaih hnuah thah a si.
Sagaing ramthen, ဆားတောင် peng, General Administration Office ih hnatuan Senior Clerk cu November 20, zinglam nazi 10:30 ah an kai ih an that, tiah theih a si.
An thahmi သန့်ဇင်ထွန်း timi pa hi SAC ralhrang hnenah mi a zuarthlai theu ih GA dungthlun in a puarthau thei tuk ruangah thianfai a si thu, tualsung hriamhrei kai pawlkom ih tuanvoneitu cun a sim.
“Anih hi Dalan a tuannak a rei zet zo. Amai’ ruangah mi tam zet kaih an si ih thihnak thlanmual liamtu khal an tor zet,” tiah ဆားတောင်မိုးကြိုးပြည်သူ့ကာကွယ်ရေးတပ်ဖွဲ့ ih tuanvoneitu cun Irrawaddy Times hnenah a sim.
An thahmi သန့်ဇင်ထွန်း kum 50 hi palik thawn an pehtlaihaw zet, tiah amah thei zettu mi pakhat in a rel.
ဝက်လက် lamih khual a tlawnnak ah remcang zetin an kai ih an that, tiah theih a si.
